concept.title: 5317.7406 Contract Clauses

conbody.p: Contracting officers must insert the clause at AFFARS 5352.217-9000 , Long Lead Limitation of Government Liability, in all long-lead procurement solicitations and contracts initiated with advance procurement funds.
